getRequiredMessagingQuorum(uint64).details: returns the required quorum for the srcChain & dstChain

params.srcChainId_: is the chain id from which the message (payload) is sent

returns.quorum_: the minimum number of message bridges required for processing

setRequiredMessagingQuorum(uint64,uint25.details: allows inheriting contracts to set the messaging quorum for a specific sender chain

params.quorum_: the minimum number of message bridges required for processing NOTE: overriding child contracts should handle the sender validation & setting of message quorum
params.srcChainId_: is the chain id from which the message (payload) is sent

setRequiredMessagingQuorum(uint64,uint25.notice: quorum is the number of extra ambs a message proof must go through and be validated
